gui.controller

Class CreateReportsScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.controller.CreateReportsScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class CreateReportsScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class responsible for managing the UI interactions related to report generation. Implements the Initializable interface to initialize JavaFX components.

      • CreateReportsScreenController

        public CreateReportsScreenController(java.lang.Object employee)
        Constructs a new CreateReportsScreenController with the given employee. Adjusts available reports and parks based on the employee's type.
        Parameters:
        employee - The employee for whom the controller is created.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        Initializes the controller after its root element has been completely processed. Initializes UI components and sets event handlers.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object.
        resources - The resources used to localize the root object.

      • onParkChangeSelection

        private void onParkChangeSelection(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Event handler triggered when the user selects a park from the park selection ComboBox. Updates the selectedPark field with the newly selected park.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent triggered by selecting a park.

      • onYearChangeSelection

        private void onYearChangeSelection(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Event handler triggered when the user selects a year from the year selection ComboBox. Updates the selectedYear field with the newly selected year.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent triggered by selecting a year.

      • onMonthChangeSelection

        private void onMonthChangeSelection(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Event handler triggered when the user selects a month from the month selection ComboBox. Updates the selectedMonth field with the newly selected month.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent triggered by selecting a month.

      • onChangeReportSelection

        private void onChangeReportSelection(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Event handler invoked when the user selects a report type from the ComboBox. Updates the selected report type accordingly.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent triggered by selecting a report type.

      • onGenerateReportClicked

        public void onGenerateReportClicked()
        Event handler invoked when the user clicks the "Generate Report" button. Initiates the generation of the selected report.

      • validateGuiFields

        private boolean validateGuiFields()
        Validates the input fields in the graphical user interface (GUI) for generating a report. Checks if the report type, park, year, and month are properly selected.
        Returns:
        true if all fields are validated successfully, indicating that the user input is valid; false otherwise, along with an error message displayed for the invalid field(s).

      • hideErrorMessage

        private void hideErrorMessage()
        Hides the error message section in the UI by clearing the error message text and setting the error section to invisible. This method is typically called when there are no errors to display.

      • showErrorMessage

        private void showErrorMessage(java.lang.String error)
        Displays an error message in the UI by setting the error message text and making the error section visible. This method is typically called when there is an error to be displayed.
        Parameters:
        error - The error message to be displayed.
